column1:
if (!Array.prototype.indexOf)
	{
	  Array.prototype.indexOf = function(elt /*, from*/)
	  {
		var len = this.length >>> 0;
		var from = Number(arguments[1]) || 0;
		from = (from < 0)
			 ? Math.ceil(from)
			 : Math.floor(from);
		if (from < 0)
		  from += len;
		for (; from < len; from++)
		{
		  if (from in this &&
			  this[from] === elt)
			return from;
		}
		return -1;
	  };
	}
